document_data.name: Vaeren
document_data.mainbody: '''House Vaeren''' was one of the noble families of [[Cormyr]], and one of the oldest noble families of [[Marsember]].{{Cite dragon/412/Eye on the Realms: The Thing in the Crypt}}
document_data.Members: * [[Murleeme Keskrel]] was part of House Vaeren before her marriage.
